text: Bekaa Sporting Club (), formerly Al Nabi Chit Sporting Club (), is a football club based in Al-Nabi Shayth, Bekaa Valley, Lebanon, that competes in the . The club gained promotion to the Lebanese Premier League for the first time at the start of the 2014–15 season, becoming the first team to represent the Bekaa region in the first division. However, they were relegated back to the Second Division in 2019. ==Players== ===Current squad=== == Honours == * Lebanese Second Division ** Winners (1): 2013–14 ==References== Category:Football clubs in Lebanon
title: Bekaa SC
